summary: Sir David Bower Mitchell  was a British Conservative politician.
full_text:
Sir David Bower Mitchell  was a British Conservative politician who was a member of Parliament for over 30 years, and who served as a junior minister in Margaret Thatcher's government.
^ "Sir David Mitchell dead: Former Conservative MP and minister dies aged 86 - Home News - UK - The Independent". www.independent.co.uk. Retrieved Aug 30, 2014. 
^ Wood, Alan H. . "Times" Guide to the House of Commons 1992. London: Times Books. ISBN 9780723004974. Retrieved Aug 30, 2014.
title: David Mitchell (politician)
